blog_post.title: FA Cup Game Week Special Nikita
blog_post.content:
The FA Cup Third round kicks off this week and FanLeague has put together a special slip for this very occasion.

We have handpicked 13 of the top matches kicking off on Saturday at 3PM so get your picks in early! 

Make sure you get your predictions in early and don't forget, the Player of the Week who is the only Player to correctly predict all 13 matches in a Game Week will walk away with £10,000!

Good Luck!
